To help you with leave management, I need to know what specifically you'd like to know.  Are you an employee or a manager?  The available options depend on your role.  For example, employees can access their Leave Register, apply for Comp Off, check their WFH/OD records, and cancel leave. Managers have access to additional features like approving/rejecting leave requests, adding comp-off, and generating reports.

user: where can I mark WFH for some days
ai: Yes, you can mark WFH for multiple days.  Click on the down arrow next to the check-in and check-out button, then select the date range to mark WFH/OD.

Hello! ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to Talenticks. How can I assist you today?

The Learning & Development (L&D) policy outlines MEETCS's commitment to fostering a continuous learning culture.  It applies to all permanent full-time and part-time employees, with temporary/contract staff participation requiring managerial approval.  The policy details roles and responsibilities for employees, managers, and HR, and covers various training delivery methods, including formal sessions, OJT, e-learning, and external resources.  Training categories include technical, managerial, and soft skills, as well as professional certifications.  Eligibility for individual training programs requires a minimum of 6 months of employment, and company-sponsored mandatory training is fully funded.  The policy also explains the procedure for applying for external training, including reimbursement after completion (with a 2-year post-certification service requirement).  More details are available in the full L&D policy document accessible through the Onboarding > Company Policies section.

user: I want to check the leaves of employees under me
ai: To check the leaves of your employees, you need to go to the **Leave Management** section and then select **Leave Dashboard Mgr** or **Mgr Leave Report**.

user: how can I download all employees payslips
ai: This question is not covered in the provided documentation.  There is information on downloading *your own* payslips, but not on downloading payslips for all employees.

To download your payslips, click on the "Payslip" submenu located within the "Finance" menu.
